component.description: Wizard provides an ajax enhanced UI to implement a workflow easily in a single page. Wizard consists of several child tab components where each tab represents a step in the process.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: step
attribute.description: Id of the current step in flow.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style of the main wizard container element.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main wizard container element.

attribute.name: flowListener
attribute.description: Server side listener to invoke when wizard attempts to go forward or back.

attribute.name: showNavBar
attribute.description: Specifies visibility of default navigator arrows. Default is true.

attribute.name: showStepStatus
attribute.description: Specifies visibility of default step title bar. Default is true.

attribute.name: onback
attribute.description: Javascript event handler to be invoked when flow goes back.

attribute.name: onnext
attribute.description: Javascript event handler to be invoked when flow goes forward.

attribute.name: nextLabel
attribute.description: Label of next navigation button. Default is "Next".

attribute.name: backLabel
attribute.description: Label of back navigation button. Default is "Back".
